boardgame.name: Outpost
boardgame.description: Players compete to build the best outpost. They must build and staff factories to produce resources which are then used to build more factories and purchase any of 13 outpost improvements which give different advantages (ranging from production technologies, resource storage, and increased population maximums to resource producing stations). Improvements are purchased through auctions, and each player may win several per round. There are 3 phases in the game, and with each phase after the first a new set of improvements are available to purchase. Each staffed factory and improvement is worth a certain number of victory points (ranging from 1 pt for an ore factory to 20 points for a moon base) and the first player to reach 75 points wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This game's mechanisms were later reused in The Scepter of Zavandor and, to a lesser extent, in Phoenicia._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: This much-sought 1992 TimJim classic is in pristine condition, still in shrinkwrap! This would by a premier showpiece in any game collection.
The box has taken some hits, but the contents are superb. The game is punched, but it all appears to be there.

Everything is in excellent condition - hardly played. Even the box is only showing the slightest signs of wear. Weight inc packing 1355g UK Parcel Post £5.20 UK First class £6.00 Surface Worldwide£8.92 Europe Airmail £8.91 USA Airmail £15.67

Played once, and I believe it to be complete. And I say this EVEN THOUGH the counter mix does not match that listed in the ruleset. I have checked with a number of other owners of the game, and their sets all come out to about the same counter mix. Specifically: 140 Population Counters present (rules claim 149) 153 Factory Counters Present (rules claim 253) - broken out as : - 20 Orange - 34 Blue - 45 Gray - 29 Yellow - 25 Green The above numbers basically match those given in this list: http://www.boardgamegeek.com/file/info/19983 and this reply: http://www.boardgamegeek.com/article/3024668#3024668 Further, all Production, Colony Upgrade, and Purchase Order cards are present. Given the value and rarity of the game, Insurance required, Tracking optional but strongly advised. All Shipping to be paid by the buyer. Of course, I will entertain reasonable counter-offers.
Game is unpunched and in excellent condition.

Game is in excellent condition - there is just the slightest wear to the outer box. Contents look unplayed. All the components are present and correct.
Weight inc packing 1210g UK Parcel Post £5.41 UK First class £5.45 Surface Worldwide £8.95 Europe Airmail £8.39 USA Airmail £15.68 Shipping costs shown are for an individual game. I will combine shipping as best I can. Large packages (5kg, say 6 games) are very cost-effective to ship internationally via DHL. Ask if you want a detailed price.

Stronghold Games (SG2 003) As a Commander on a remote Outpost, your mission is to build and expand your colony to its fullest. Purchase Factories and run them with either Humans colonists or Robots. Produce resources from your Factories to generate credits to continue to expand your Outpost. Bid on the all-important Colony upgrades on your way to becoming The Outpost Director!

English 20th Anniversary edition in very good condition. Lightly played. Box has a bit of shelf wear. Unfortunately I have misplaced the dice, it comes with a D4, a D10 and a D12. They are fairly easy to substitute as they are only used to randomise which auction items will be added each round so you don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t need the result of a particular type of dice during the game itself. Other than the dice everything else is included, along with the kicker expansion which the new edition comes with. UK postage £5.00 Courier for multiple games between £5.00 and £7.00 Please contact me for international postage options Collection possible from West London Payment via bank transfer or paypal (buyer to add 5% towards paypal fees)

Opened, complete, played six times. All resource cards (except the three very rare ones that aren_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t used much) are sleeved. Played twice without sleeves on the resource cards, then played four times with sleeves. Techs and kickers in like new condition (or very close). If there was an insert in the box, it is long gone. Tokens are bagged neatly and nicely. Shipping: This will ship via USPS, Regional Rate B or Flat Rate or even regular. My guess is $7-15 to ship, fully insured, depending on how far you are from zip code 46516. Payment: I take Paypal, USPS Money Orders, and Walmart Money Orders. Bitcoin works too.
Like New condition. Ships USPS priority. Check my rating and buy with confidence!

New games from Essen! Low shipment! (as long as supply lasts) Prices are including 21% VAT (for shipments outside the EU VAT is not applicable). Shipping and payment upon agreement. If you email us, we can give you an estimate of the shipping costs, which are pretty good thanks to our central location within Europe (games below 2kg usually between 6-8E). We prefer payment through IBAN, but Paypal with 4% surcharge is also possible.
